entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@RealCandaceO The only thing you're right on is Juicy Smoulle.

1. #metoo requires that one have a complaint filed from the time that's credible. @ReadeAlexandra doesn't.
3. #covid19 hasn't been thoroughly tested in many states.
4. The claims about Arbery are irrelevant in the eyes of GA law.
